text: @realDonaldTrump You came to our beautiful State of Maine, where you were not welcome and went through the Puritan Company with no mask, putting hard working Mainers at Risk for Coronavirus, because of your stupidity and arrogance. Everything is about you and you hate Americans. You are a cancer!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
